item.title: Danmaku Unlimited 4 WYVER ULTRA announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

A modern labor of love tribute to classic shoot 'em ups.

Doragon Entertainment has announced shoot ’em up sequel Danmaku Unlimited 4 WYVER ULTRA for PC (Steam). A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Arise Wyver and fly against overwhelming odds in this modern labor of love tribute to classic shoot ’em ups!

Dynamic 4K / 120 Frames Per Second Cinematic Action

Inspired by classics like Ikaruga, Touhou, and CAVE shoot ’em ups, Danmaku Unlimited 4 WYVER ULTRA is a labor of love that perfectly blends stylish cinematic action with nail-biting bullet hell gameplay.

Strike Back With the Blade

Turn the table on your enemies with powerful screen clearing energy blade attacks. Master the blade and see your score reach stratospheric heights!

Survive Intense Boss Fights Together

Fly between life and death through mesmerizing bullet patterns solo or together in local two player co-op.

Key Features

  • Classic bullet hell shoot ’em up in glorious 4K and 120 frames per second on a custom homebrew engine.
  • Turn the storm of enemy bullets into powerful attacks with the WYVER Blade System.
  • Fly solo or in local cooperative play with a variety of fighters to choose from.
  • Multiple game modes and difficulties for newcomers and genre veterans alike.
  • Epic soundtracks by BLANKFIELD.
  • Replay system to revisit or share your perfect run.
  • Online leaderboards and achievements.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer
